__e: I was straight up with you, and you lied to my face.
Well, that someone else is sitting opposite you, and it's not looking good.
Look, you might not know but I don't answer to you, alright?
Remember who you are talking to.
She says, "I'll thank you for not using" that sort of language with me, sir."
But you haven't been entirely honest with me either.
In the face of a far-superior force, it is my judgment that it was better to sacrifice horses and save the men.
We, mankind, will face a great trial.
But you can't let the fear of getting hurt stop you from opening up to someone you care about.
